participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and thrill-seeking, Alex loves the rush of speed and the freedom of the open road. He is passionate about biking and enjoys exploring new places.
participant_1.background: i wear a motorbike helmet to protect my head. my main transportation is my motorbike. i've light skin with big brown eyes. its red with blue stripe so it shiny when i race.

participant_2.name: Sofia
